data.text: Yoonaas garaa qurxummii keessaa Waaqayyoon Waaqa isaa kadhate.
Anis, ‘Kunoo ani fuula kee duraa balleeffameera;
Ani gara hundee tulluuwwaniittin gad liqimfame;
“Warri waaqota tolfamoo faayidaa hin qabnetti cichan
Waaqayyos qurxummii sana ajaje; qurxummiin sunis lafa gogaa irratti Yoonaasin tufe.
